name: Ecosystem Science & Management Graduate Student Association
description:
The purpose of the ESSM-GSA is:
1. To represent all affiliated Ecosystem Science & Management graduate students at Texas A&M University
2. To increase the visibility of the Department of Ecosystem Science & Management at Texas A&M University.
3. To uphold and support the mission of the Department of Ecosystem Science & Management at Texas A&M University.
4. To provide a vehicle for Ecosystem Science & Management graduate students to express their needs, interest, and concerns.
5. To provide an atmosphere for Ecosystem Science & Management graduate students to participate in social, academic, and professional pursuits.
summary:
The purpose of the ESSM-GSA is:
1. To represent all affiliated Ecosystem Science & Management graduate students at Texas A&M University
